✱  At least 4 visits must be made during the pregnancy for antenatal check up — 2 visits between 4
th to 6th months, and 2 visits between 7th to 9th months.  
The first visit should be as early as possible.
✱  Two Tetanus Toxoid (TT) immunization injections are given in the first pregnancy.  In subsequent pregnancies, a single booster dose is necessary. In addition, a pregnant woman should take iron and folic acid tablets. 
✱  Diet must be nutritious to include extra milk and milk products, cereals, pulses/legumes, vegetables, fruits, oils, as one also has to eat for adequate growth of the baby. During the entire pregnancy period, the total weight  gain  should be about 10-12 kg. 
✱  Routine work should continue during pregnancy. At the same time, adequate rest, including 8 hours of sleep at night and at least 30 to 45 minutes during the day, is needed.
